message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200.  It's a great deal!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go quite that low. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $130?
